about_the_game:
Roboavenger is an exhilarating action-packed platformer that puts players in command of a remarkably agile and bouncy robot. Set in the depths of mysterious and perilous mines, the objective of the game is deceptively simple yet challenging: collect as many precious rubies as possible while evading the clutches of cunning enemies.

FEATURES
  • Agile and Bouncy Robot: Players control a highly nimble and bouncy robot, offering a unique and dynamic gameplay experience as they navigate through the challenging mine environments.
  • Ruby Collection Challenge: The main objective is to collect as many rubies as possible while exploring the mines, providing players with a clear goal and motivation to achieve high scores.
  • Treacherous Platforms and Enemies: The game features a variety of hazardous platforms that can lead the robot to fall into the abyss. Players must also dodge and outmaneuver cunning enemies and their attacks.
  • Skill-Based Gameplay: Success in Robovenger relies on players' quick reflexes, precise jumping, and strategic thinking. Mastering the mechanics is crucial to progress deeper into the mine and improve one's score.
  • Power-Ups and Upgrades: As players advance, they may discover power-ups and upgrades that enhance the robot's abilities, adding an element of progression and excitement to the gameplay.

name: Robovenger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 35 MB available space

short_description: Robovenger is an action-packed platformer where players control a nimble and bouncy robot. Their task is to collect rubies in the mines while avoiding enemies and treacherous platforms that could lead to a perilous fall. Jump skillfully to go deeper into the mine and improve your score!
